snippet: Michel Forst, the expert, said the advocates faced criticism and that those aiding women, ethnic minorities and gays were most at risk.
lead_paragraph: Michel Forst, the expert, said the advocates faced criticism and that those aiding women, ethnic minorities and gays were most at risk.

headline.main: Hungary Assails Human Rights Advocates in the Country, U.N. Expert Says

keywords.name: subject
